name: Age UK
bossPosition: Head of Legal and Company Secretary
memberOrga: Information on Age UK's local partners can be found here: http://www.ageuk.org.uk/about-us/local-partners/
goal:
Age UK is a registered charity in the United Kingdom, formed in April 2010 as the new force combining Help the Aged and Age Concern. We have almost 120 years of combined history to draw on, bringing together talents, services and solutions to enrich the lives of people in later life.

Age UK provides information and advice, runs public and parliamentary campaigns, and funds research exclusively focused on later life. We support and assist a network of 150 local Age UKs and Age Concerns throughout England and 139 Age UK friends; the Age UK family also includes Age Scotland, Age Cymru and Age NI. We run 422 Age UK charity shops throughout the UK and also offer a range of commercial products tailored to older people.

Age UK are a founding member of AGE Platform Europe, the NGO network based in Brussels. Our Public Affairs roles include working through AGE Platform, and directly on behalf of Age UK, to influence EU institutions and policy to improve later life.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Transport
euInitiatives: We currently run very limited EU engagement work mostly focused on supporting the UK network of Age Platform Europe.
